result.markdown:
--- title: "Wetenschapsfilosofie & Statistisch Redeneren" author: "Klinkenberg" date: today --- On this site you can find my statistics lectures for WSR. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} files <- list.files(full.names = F, pattern = "\\.qmd", recursive = T) files <- files[-1] lectures = data.frame() n = length(files) for (i in 1:n) { lectures[i ,'url'] <- data.frame(url = paste0("courses/WSR_PB/2022-2023/", files[i])) yaml <- rmarkdown::yaml_front_matter(files[i]) lectures[i , 'title'] = yaml$title lectures[i , 'date'] = yaml$date lectures[i , 'file_name'] = files[i] } data.frame(Date = lectures$date, Lecture = lectures$title, Handout = sprintf("[link](/%s)", lectures$url), Slides = sprintf('link', gsub("qmd", "html", lectures$url)) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display}
|Date |Lecture |Handout |Slides | |:-----------|:-----------------------|:-----------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |13 sep 2022 |Null Hypothesis Testing |[link](/courses/WSR_PB/2022-2023/nhst/nhst.qmd) |link |
::: :::
